Codes
# Country Codes

This table lists the country codes supported by the country parameter.

COUNTRY	CODE
All Regions	ALL
Argentina	AR
Australia	AU
Austria	AT
Belgium	BE
Brazil	BR
Canada	CA
Chile	CL

Sweden	SE
Switzerland	CH
Taiwan	TW
Turkey	TR
United Kingdom	GB
United States	US
